remarks: Implications for the value of an operation defined by the maps-to notation with a function into a class abstraction as a result having an element.  The domain of the function and the base set of the class abstraction may depend on the operands, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by AV, 16-Jul-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 16-May-2019.)

ovmpt3rab1.m $e |- ( ( x = X /\ y = Y ) -> M = K ) $.
ovmpt3rab1.n $e |- ( ( x = X /\ y = Y ) -> N = L ) $.
elovmpt3rab1 $p |- ( ( K e. U /\ L e. T ) -> ( A e. ( ( X O Y ) ` Z ) -> ( ( X e. _V /\ Y e. _V ) /\ ( Z e. K /\ A e. L ) ) ) ) $.
